tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE whistleblower_complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_text TEXT,
    whistleblower_name TEXT,
    complaint_date TIMESTAMP,
    investigation_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE complaint_response (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES whistleblower_complaints(complaint_id)
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT NOT NULL,
    reported_date DATE NOT NULL,
    report_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_complaint_id FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES whistleblower_complaints(complaint_id)
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_actions (
    action_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT NOT NULL,
    action_date DATE NOT NULL,
    action_taken TEXT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_report_id FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES whistleblower_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE investigations (
  investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  complaint_id INT,
  investigator_id INT,
  investigation_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_allegations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    allegation_type VARCHAR(50),
    allegation_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES whistleblower_complaints(id)
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_investigations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
    investigation_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES whistleblower_complaints(id)
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investigation_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (investigation_id) REFERENCES whistleblower_investigations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_actions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    action_taken VARCHAR(50),
    action_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES whistleblower_reports(id)
);
